availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Lycurgus T. Leavell (Todd County, KY, farmer, private, teamster)

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Leonidas Leavell and Harriett Leavell. Married to Melissie Leavell. Resident in Montgomery County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Todd County in 1860. Served in the 3rd Arkansas Infantry (C.S.A.) as private from July 2, 1861, to 1863. Served as division teamster in 1863. Reported as deserted on April 2, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Montgomery County, p. 237A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 755.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, Trenton, p. 465A.
